name: Defending your privacy in court
title: you agree not to reverse-engineer mint.com's software

tosdr.tldr: The company went to court to fight for their users' privacy rights in response to government demands for information. This is a powerful testimony about their willingness to fight back when faced with an overbroad government request. (cc-by eff, edited)
